ðŸ“– Summary: Pydantic-core is a Rust-based library that provides the core validation and serialization functionality for Pydantic. It offers significant performance improvements over previous versions of Pydantic and allows for direct validation of JSON data. While intended to be used primarily through Pydantic, it can also be used directly for advanced use cases.
